tos.title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali
tos.switch-label: By accessing, you accept the service <0>terms and conditions of use</0> and confirm to have read the <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

date-picker.switch-to-year: calendar mode active, switch to year selection mode
date-picker.switch-to-calendar: year selection mode active, switch to calendar mode
date-picker.date-selected: Select date, the selected date is {{date}}

error-boundary.title: Something went wrong
error-boundary.description: We were unable to load the page. Reload it, or try again later.

not-accessible.title: The platform cannot be accessed
not-accessible.description: SEND is currently being tested and is not yet available. If you are an institution and have completed your membership, you will receive updates regarding the date of activation of the platform. For more information on the initiative,

access-denied: You do not have the necessary authorizations to access this page
not-logged: Log in to the Reserved Area
not-logged-subtitle: To use SEND, access the Reserved Area with your SPID or CIE. Then, press "Manage" on the corresponding card.

not-found.title: 404: The page you are looking for does not exist
not-found.description: You are here by mistake, try using navigation.

messages.404-message: An error has occurred. Please try again later
messages.403-message: Enter and log in with SPID or CIE.
messages.401-message: Current user does not have the authorizations
messages.500-message: Due to a temporary service issue, your request has not been submitted. Try again later.
messages.lacking-grants-for-app-title: You are not authorized to log in
messages.error-in-initial-info-loading: We were unable to retrieve data needed to start the application
messages.invalid-token-title: You cannot log in due to a technical issue – invalid token
messages.generic-message: An error has occurred. Please try again later
messages.generic-api-error-main-text: We were unable to retrieve this data.

footer.go-to-pagopa: Link: go to the website of PagoPA S.p.A.
footer.personal-data: Right to the protection of personal data
footer.social: Link: go to the {{social}} website of PagoPA S.p.A.
footer.legal-part-1: joint stock company with sole shareholder – share capital of € 1,000,000 fully paid up – registered office in Rome, Piazza Colonna 370
footer.legal-part-2: ZIP CODE 00187 – Reg. no. in the Rome Business Register, Fiscal code and VAT number 15376371009

no-spaces-at-edges: Delete spaces at the beginning or end

upload-file.hash-code-descr: The hash code is a unique alphanumeric code used to identify a certain file
upload-file.ext-not-supported: File extension is not supported. Please try again with another file.
upload-file.file-size-exceeded: The selected file exceeds the maximum size of {{limit}}.
upload-file.loading-error: An error occurred while uploading the file. Please try again.
